sentences.en: The intelligentsia, ” retorts one of his friends.
sentences.cn: 知识界。” 他的一个朋友如此反驳。

sentences.en: But Kazakhstan's intelligentsia and its opposition beg to differ.
sentences.cn: 但哈萨克斯坦的知识界和反对派却不这么认为。

sentences.en: Has the Russian intelligentsia lost its social force or its intellectual power?
sentences.cn: 俄罗斯知识分子是否已丧失了推动社会的能力？是否已丧失了知识分子的力量？
